programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem pārģērbjas tērpos no dažādām pasaules valstīm, bet tad sastrīdas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis māca Pepai un Džordžam jautru spēli, ko spēlēt, kamēr gaida, kad pierims lietus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Visi ir sajūsmā, kad Trušu mamma paziņo, ka gaida mazuli! Vai tas būs viens mazulis vai dvīņi?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ponijs Pedro izliekas, ka ir kovbojs, stāstot visiem stāstus nometnē, kas izveidota dārzā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vectēvs ierodas ar sēklām Pepai un Džordžam. Tētis palīdz, tēlojot putnubiedēkli.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Dakteri Kāmi visu dienu apmeklē gandrīz visi pacienti.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs iepazīstas ar ķenguru Kailiju un viņas brāli Džoju. Pepa parāda Kailijai, kā lēkāt pa peļķēm, bet kura uzlēks visaugstāk?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Lai svinētu lapsas Fredija dzimšanas dienu, bērni dodas uz Dinozauru parku. Vectēvs Trusis ir viņu līderis, viņi seko dinozauru pēdām, lai atrastu Fredija dzimšanas dienas našķus.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam jāizvēlas starp Angliju un Peru, pirms sākas futbola kausa mačs, taču viņš abas valstis mīl vienādi stipri. Pienācis brīdis tantei Lūsijai doties mājās, bet atlicis laiks vēl pēdējam piedzīvojumam. Vai tomēr ne?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ceļot skeitparku, komanda sastopas ar problēmu. Komanda palīdz popzvaigznei nogādāt savu autobusu pilsētā.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam ir grūti izvēlēties varoni īpašai foto sienai parkā. Varbūt viņam jāmeklē tuvāk mājām. Padingtons kļūst par varonīgu skeitbordistu, pateicoties Mateo un īpašai maskai, bet cik maģiska ir šī maska?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Teilors atklāj, ka ir viņa dzimšanas diena, bet kā lai draugi to padara īpašu, ja viņi par to nezināja? Ir Bērnsa nakts, un Bērdas kundze pastāsta Padingtonam par retu radību, ko sauc par savvaļas hagisu. Vai tas viņus apciemos?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Ir Zemes diena, un Padingtonam ir svarīgs uzdevums - iestādīt koku, bet vai viņš atradīs ideālu vietu, pirms ir par vēlu? Bazs rīko pavasara ražas svētkus, un visi tos izbauda, ienesot savas tradīcijas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un viņa draugi nāk talkā konsteblam Velsam, lai atrisinātu pazudušā Vindzoras rubīna lietu. Pateicoties Lūsijas tantes īpašajai receptei, Brauni mājās uzsāk ēdināšanas biznesu, bet tas ir smags darbs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu. Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis apmetas mājā, ko viņam uzceļ Fransuā tētis.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija pieskata mēness papagaili.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis lasa Pepai un Džordžam vakara pasaku. Vēlāk Džordžs atkal pamostas, tāpēc Pepai jāizdomā cita pasaka.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kad ģimene aizbrauc uz skaisto kalnu, tētis pazaudē mašīnas atslēgas dziļā notekā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kad viņa mīļākais dinozaurs pazaudē asti, Džordžs Lapsas kunga veikalā meklē jaunu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Truša jaunkundzes vilciens ir saplīsis, tāpēc vectēvs aizdod savu vilcieniņu Trūdiju.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Rotaļu grupā ir mājdzīvnieku sacensības, un visi atnesuši savus mājdzīvniekus. Dakteris Kāmis ir vērtētājs, bet ir tik grūti izvēlēties labāko mājdzīvnieku.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Fui! Mājā ir zirneklis! Mamma liek tētim no tā atbrīvoties.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas ģimene paliek māsīcas Hlojas mājā. Diena bijusi gara, un visi ir miegaini. Bet mazais Aleksandrs neļauj gulēt ar savu raudāšanu!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Bērni bēdājas, jo viņu mīļākā skolotāja Gazeles jaunkundze dodas prom. Bet ballīte ir labas atvadas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Vecmamma rāda Dorai fotoalbumu ar putnu bildēm. Tomēr albumā vēl trūkst Fiksadū fotogrāfijas. Dora apņemas atrast un nofotografēt ašo putnu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz papagailēnam atgriezties mājās - taču ceļā putnēns nebeidz mēdīties!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu! Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala saņem paciņu ar rozā zvēriņiem, ko nosauc par Skvīkijiem.

programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija pieskata mēness papagaili.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.desc: Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa ķepaiņu celtnieku ģimene pārceļas uz kaimiņpilsētu Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, rotaļājas un būvē visu kopienai nepieciešamo.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene gatavojas būvēt tiltu, taču nelietīgajam Ātrmeistaram ir cita ideja. Rabla komandai jāstrādā kopā un jāizglābj visi, uzbūvējot jaunu, drošu tiltu uz Celtnieklīci.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš grib paaugties lielāks, lai drīkstētu vizināties karuseļos - taču kļūst milzīgs! Dora viņam palīdz atgūt ierasto izmēru. Mugursomai ir īpaša dāvana Dorai, bet tā nevar atvērties! Draugi dodas lūgt palīdzību vecmāmiņai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dorai uzdāvina kucēnu, bet kaķītis Lakijs kļūst greizsirdīgs un aizbēg no mājām. Dora dodas viņam atgādināt, ka visi viņu ļoti mīl. Svarīgas čempionāta spēles dienā visi Doras draugi sasirgst ar šķavām. Dora palīdz komandai izveseļoties!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kad Barbatēta dzīve parādās Barbamamma un barbabērni, viņa māja paliek par mazu.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Jasmine, and Winn take an online BFF compatibility test. To their surprise, they fail! Nobody is fazed, except for Hazel, who overthinks the results and wishes that her friends could know exactly whats in her head. Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, which lands all of them inside Hazels mind. As they go through her mind like a museum, Hazel continues to overthink everything they see. Now, Hazel must overcome her negative thoughts and battle a literal mind worm to get her friends out! // When Hazel wishes she didnt have a gap in her teeth, the Tooth Fairy fills her gap with a talking tooth, Toothica. At first, she seems like a lot of fun, but when Toothica gets Hazel in trouble with her parents and plans a party in Hazels mouth Hazel isnt invited to, Hazel decides she wants her gone! The Tooth Fairy, however, takes Toothicas side and is even set on honoring her at a gala. Hazel must find a way to prove Toothica is no good and get back her gap or be stuck with this rotten tooth forever.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Cosmo and Wanda summon a friendly, talking, trash eating dumpster named Danky! Together they spread the word about sustainability and caring for the earth. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Bubble and Firefly are on the lookout for an amazing adventure, so they head to Gargamels hovel. Once there, they see that Dwayne and Rowena are spending the night at their uncles. Rowena is desperate for the tooth fairy to come and get her baby tooth thats hanging on by a thread! This gives Bubble an idea: theyre going to steal Rowenas tooth and take it back to the village to prove that theyre also adventurers. // When Gargamel finds a way of turning off all the lights thanks to a magic switch, the Smurfs are plunged into complete darkness. Only Firefly can help them to see in the dark ... but that attracts Gargamel to the village. He catches all of the Smurfs, except for Firefly, who will have to be very brave to free her friends. This gives her a great confidence boost!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Its Christmas and tradition dictates that there should be 13 desserts on the table. But Chef has got his quantities wrong and hes only made 12! Chef and Blossom head into the forest to find the ingredients to make the missing dessert. They run into Gargamel who is picking the last walnuts of the season to prepare a meal for his family. He wants to impress his mother! Theres only one solution: to follow him. But Gargamels mother turns up with Dwayne and Rowena. The Smurfs offer to help Gargamel to finish his menu. They hope to create a diversion and steal his dessert. // Its Jokeys turn to look after Baby Smurf. Brainy accuses him of being a bad babysitter so Bubble offers to help him but then things get tricky: Baby Smurf is somehow turned into a snail! Brainy is threatening to tell Papa Smurf everything, so Jokey and Bubble need to find a way of turning Baby Smurf back into Baby Smurf. Quick! But more disasters lie ahead.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Clumsy and Dimwitty cause an accident when they argue once again about who is going to drive the fire truck. They dont want to be told off by Papa Smurf so they decide to get rid of it. But when a fire starts in the village, Papa Smurf orders them to go and get it. They do all they can to get it back but it wont be easy! They bump into the ogre and Begonia before heading to Gargamels. // Gargamel sets a new trap for the Smurfs by bewitching pebbles. The Smurfs are so enchanted by these shiny wonders that they argue endlessly about their incredible beauty. Luckily Voltaire is on the lookout and isnt hypnotized! He frees Lily from the magic spell and together they save their friends.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The school is looking for a new mascot, and Chloe and her new friends think they can make an impression by designing the winning entry. Chloe, Jinx, and Booch create a costume they are excited about, leaving it at the beach house until the they can present it at school. Meanwhile, Phoebe learns that Max has gotten them jobs at the school, but while he has a cushy Vice Principal job, she is the new Art teacher. Their argument over this leads to accidentally destroying it the new mascot costume. After Chloe discovers what theyve done and is furious with them, Max and Phoebe realize that being her guardian comes with more responsibility than they imagined.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Determined to learn the truth about Jacks secret morning life, Lily does the unthinkable and wakes up early. But her sleuthing gets them both in big trouble. // Lil and her BFFs Anusha and Debs fight to win the coveted trophy at Hank N Beans arcade.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick and Squidina follow a runaway idea brick into Randomland. // After discovering that Patrick never finished behavioral training, the family home-schools him.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob is bitten by DoodleBob while studying for an exam. SpongeBob shrugs it off, mistaking it for a papercut. But under the moonlight, SpongeBob turns into a mischievous creature called the WereDoodle! As the WereDoodle, he wreaks havoc all over town, doodling on everything. Mr. Krabs leads a hunt to end the chaos, but DoodleBob arrives to apologize for WereDoodles wrongdoings and lift the curse... until Mr. Krabs gets a papercut and becomes the new WereDoodle! // Its gorilla suit day! To celebrate, SpongeBob dresses up in a gorilla suit with Patrick dressed as his handler. As they run around town, people mistake SpongeBob for a real gorilla, causing panic that leads to SpongeBob being taken off to the zoo. Meanwhile, an actual gorilla escapes the zoo, running around town causing even more havoc. The mix-up is eventually cleared-just in time for Squidward to have one final run-in with another gorilla.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max appears to have willingly switched to the villains side, prompting President Kickbutt to assign Captain Perfect as Phoebes new superhero partner. Max quickly gains the villains trust and leads Kiefer and the other henchmen to his house to fight Phoebe and Captain Perfect. During the fight, Max and Kiefer capture Phoebe and Captain Perfect. Max reveals he was never really evil, but was only pretending to gain access to the Chip-Chucker. Max and Phoebe defeat Kiefer and the henchmen, and they discover that the Chip-Chucker contains technology that leads them to the identitly of the Mastermind, who is revealed to be Lazlo Chance, B.C.s father. Chloe is anxious about going to the dance with B.C. and keeps trying to avoid him whenever a slow song comes on. Seeking help from Phoebe, she hides in the photo booth to teleport home. However, Jinx and Booch find a photo of her mid-teleport (they cannot see who did the teleporting), leading them to believe theres a superhero among them.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Still eager to impress Captain Perfect, Max volunteers to help him with his younger sister, a headstrong girl who seems to drawn to evil. Max tries to show her the benefits of being good, but she tricks him and heads to auditions for new Mastermind henchmen. Max disguises himself and goes the auditions, too, hoping to stop her from working for a supervillain. Both he and the young girl are chosen to prove their evil and destroy Splat by Sea, but Max reveals his identity to her and talks her out of being a villain just before the restaurant is ruined. Meanwhile, Phoebe convinces BC he needs an elaborate dance-posal to ask Chloe to the school dance, but her interference does more harm than good.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: After Hazel makes her one-millionth wish, Cosmo and Wanda promise her one rule-free wish as a reward. But when their magic doesnt work, they take a trip to Fairy World to investigate and discover Dev has taken control. Fed up with living in Hazels shadow, hes teamed up with Irep to give control of the Big Wand to anti-fairies and now kids all over the world have the opportunity to grant wishes rule-free. Before Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda can stop Dev, he traps Cosmo and Wanda in butterfly net cages and sends Hazel back home without her fairies to help her. While in power, Dev changes Fairy World to his own image and liking, and even reveals the existence of magic to everyone on Earth. Its total chaos. With the fate of Fairy World on her shoulders, Hazel enlists the help of Jasmine, Winn, Antony, and a few magical friends from past wishes, to rise up against Dev and his anti-fairy forces. Hazel must save Cosmo, Wanda, Peri, and Fairy World, before making a very special rule-free wish.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Lily and Chef are preparing a picnic when theyre attacked by Azrael. They throw the delicious muffins that theyd made for the party at him. But Azrael doesnt like cakes and this annoys Chef. So he decides to make the most delicious cat food for him. Azrael eats the cat food and it makes him as cuddly and cute as a kitten. This gives Gargamel an idea: hes going to give this magic cat food to his mother. She also becomes as gentle as a kitten ... but not for long! // Lily makes waffles that are so delicious that even Dwayne cant get enough of them! To escape from him, Lily and Greedy run away with the waffle truck, trying to lose him. He catches up with them and eats all of Greedys waffles. But thats still not enough, Dwayne wants even more waffles. What he doesnt know is that Voltaire has got his eye on him and knows how to defend Lily.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Life is more fun when youre dancing! Thats what Meteorite is thinking whilst Brainy is trying to get everyone to work so that the village is clean when Papa Smurf returns. When Meteorite finds a night club in the forest, she brings it back to the village with help from Vanity. The discosmurf encounters a huge success - all of the Smurfs and Smurfies are dancing ... but beware, it might be one of Gargamels traps. // Everyone is preparing a dance party and Diaper Daddy is delighted to be going. But his battery is nearly empty so Handy puts him in standby mode to recharge him. When he wakes up, hes devastated to learn that hes missed the party! Annoyed, he heads off into the forest looking for a new family. The first person he bumps into is Dwayne, who adopts him as his new toy, with Rowena looking on with envy. Handy will do everything he can to get his friend back.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel tries to teach Dwayne to catch the Smurfs. As an incentive, he offers him a deal: hell get him a new Snap if he catches a Smurf. Suddenly Dwayne is all in! He prepares a potion that will turn him into a super tracker. What he hadnt expected was the potion turning him into a hunting dog. After several unsuccessful but funny attempts, he finds his way to the Smurf village. Oh no! Who can get him off the trail? // Meteorite is tireless: shes always tapping the beat on whatever she has at hand. When shes drumming in the forest, she and Storm run into Gargamel. They manage to escape but she forgets her drum. Gargamel makes the most of this and bewitches it so that it comes to life. Its music hypnotizes the Smurfies and leads them straight to Gargamel. Meteorite uses his own weapon against him in an unexpected way!

programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max unwittingly let Chloes friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, leaving them traumatized and craving more sugar. Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet with Chloes parents to discuss the lack of supervision at the beach house. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel and Jasmine have planned their very first sleepover but Dev Dimmadome threatens to throw an even better party! To draw her classmates attention Hazel boasts that she lives in a luxury hotel and wishes her apartment building into The Wellsington Hotelsington Hotel. Now she must balance running the hottest hotel in Dimmadelphia and spending time with Jasmine and Winn before they check out of the friendship! // Hoping to win a class superlative, Hazel wishes to be famous at her school. Father Time cuts her a deal for 1,500 minutes of fame, but Principal Krentz is not happy about Hazels celebrity status and threatens to transfer her if she doesnt stop being a "distraction" by the end of lunch. With tons of time left on her wish, Nick of Time arrives with a solution: if Hazel acts like a New Yorker, her remaining minutes will turn into New York Minutes and pass faster. Can Hazel act New Yorky enough to beat the clock?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse! // Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Tired of SpongeBobs chaotic driving, Mrs. Puff sends him away to Klopnod on an exchange student driver program. In return, she receives Peppercorn, a sea-mule, who is an excellent driver! Meanwhile, SpongeBob learns that his frenzied driving skills are perfectly suited for the Klopnodian roads (where only farm animals are allowed to drive). However, SpongeBobs newfound Klopnodian driving skills do not translate well upon returning to Bikini Bottom. // Slappy becomes a waiter at the Krusty Krab but scares off customers with his creepy demeanor. He promises Mr. Krabs that his monster friends will be coming to dine that night. Later, the restaurant is packed with monsters and Krabs is thrilled! However, Nosferatu arrives and begs Slappy to return as his servant. Slappy agrees, to Mr. Krabs disappointment - he loved the business the monsters brought in! In the end, however, he realizes that monsters pay in bugs, not cash!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj
programme.desc: All the Guptas love Valentines Day, except for Sammy who vows not to get caught up in the holiday. Until...// Sammy and Raj pretend to be sick to stay home and watch the Domino Championships, but faking it doesnt go to plan...

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: The twins take a cactus called Pricklebutt to the beach and end up mounting a dramatic search and rescue mission. // Best and Bester wont let Grumpy Pants round of golf stop them from catching the finale of their favourite show.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Its Best to the rescue when Besters phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bester finds that the only way to get her brothers attention when hes glued to the game, is to be in the game. // Best and Bester stage a crazy publicity stunt for Grafifis repair shop which has everyone fearing for their lives.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: When Best breaks the last clean plate, rather than do the dishes, Best and Bester head out to buy a brand new one. // Best and Bester decide to make the best milkshake ever, only to find themselves in a bitter contest with Flip Flop.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best wins a competition to pitch his story ideas to world famous author A N Other, and finds that threes a crowd. // Best and Bester housesit for Diamondo and realise that theres more to it than massage chairs and unlimited snacks.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Not your average bunch of teenagers, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have been expertly trained by their anthropomorphic rat sensei, Splinter, in the art of ninjutsu. Criminals of New York beware, beneath the streets of this concrete metropolis, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael are waiting to put their training into practice, battling evil forces within the city and restoring peace. From petty thieves, to evil overlords, to aliens of an unfamiliar kind, New York is safe in the hands of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig
programme.desc: This animated comedy show follows the outrageous and often gross-out antics of a enthusiastic and curious 12-year-old boy named Sanjay Patel and his best friend and a master of disguise, a talking snake named Craig. These two are match made in heaven as they find themselves in crazy and hilarious situations every day in their home town of Lundgren. They complete each other and together they are ready to face any challenges and difficulties that life has ahead for them.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: Dad longs for a simpler life and decides to convert the Turner home into a farm. Unfortunately, it takes Cosmo and Wandas magic to give Dad a green thumb, and when theyre swept away by a tornado, its up to Timmy to save the farm…and his fairies! // When monsters start appearing in Dimmsdale, Mr. Crocker launches a web show to expose them. Turns out the monsters are being poofed up by Timmys fairies - and this is Crockers big chance to catch them red-handed.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The penguins are inspired after witnessing a good deed executed by a zoo patron. So they set out to perform their own good deeds - penguins style. When things dont work out as planned, a domino of bad events requires fixing. // While Mort and Private stop to liberate Cheezy Bitz from the zoo vending machine they are both sucked in. Each attempt to escape fails and their only hope is to be rescued, but everyone is searching for them outside of the zoo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Best and Bester

programme.desc: Best and Bester go on a mission to find out what gives their favourite cereal "Tenta-Flakes" such a purply taste. // Besters outlandish ideas to make mini golf fun for the customers nearly lead to disaster, but Best saves the day.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
programme.desc: Greg pretends to be injured to avoid having to do a scary trick on the racetrack for his friends. // During a "skill-sharpening" game of hide and seek, Lil Pal hides in Harrys backpack and accidentally gets taken to school.

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: It is pure luck to have a genie to fulfill all wishes, to have two of them is something incredible. Leah is a little girl with a genie bottle necklace, which includes Shimmer and Shine, genie twins. Shimmer is a genie with blue eyes and pink hair, encouraging and passionate, she has a pet, a gibbon monkey Tala. Shine is her twin genie with purple eyes and blue hair, big animal lover. Her pet is a little Bengal tiger Nahal. Zac is Leahs neighbor with red hair and blue eyes, and her best human friend. Leah is making three wishes every day, genies are doing their best but the results are far from perfect, as genies are very young and unskilled. This is the source of awkward and comic situations, but in the end girls manage to get over all difficulties.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Rusty Rivets is a fantastic and picturesque animated series about Rusty who lives in Sparkton Hills along with his friend Ruby Ramirez, a robotic tyrannosaurid named Botasaur, and a group of smaller robots known as the Bits. Rusty is a smart inventor and a little genius who with the help of his amazing discoveries helps his friends out of difficulties. Rusty constructs robots of different sizes, forms and purposes, he is in love with science, technology and engineering. Together with his friend Ruby they can repair any old machinery and out-of-date equipment. Their splendid intellect arouses envy and toxic rivals do not play the game clean.

programme.title: Kamp Koral

SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: Dad changes Timmys room into a surveillance center to prove that his kindly neighbor, Dinkleberg, is truly evil. Running for class president. His opponent? Poof! But if Foop cant win over his classmates, hell just as easily destroy them!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: "The lemur habitat acquires a new resident, Clemson, and King Julien loves to order him around. Maurice enjoys not having to work, but Mort remains highly suspicious of Clemson, he knows that he is up to something evil. // Kowalskis attempt to super charge his brain backfires and now hes dumber than mud. His lack of intellect starts to comprise the troops missions. Skipper, Private and Rico must find a cure for him before he hurts someone."

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: When the group arrives at a small Earth Kingdom mining town, they see an earthbender, named Haru, who is practicing his ability, but he runs away when Katara tries to confront him about it. They soon learn that the Fire Nation has taken over the town, that earthbending is forbidden and all earthbenders are taken away to an offshore prison. However, when an elderly man is trapped in a collapsed mine, Katara urges Haru to use his powers to save the mans life, but then, the old man reports Haru to the authorities. Katara blames herself for his predicament and she vows to rescue him, but will she succeed?

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: When Catarina Stripe takes the role of substitute teacher, Clawdeen and Toralei become unlikely partners.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bests sound effects threaten to derail Besters one chance to shine on the opening night of a Flip Flops play. // Best and Besters "inbestigation" into some missing golf balls escalates into a full-blown mountain rescue mission.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide Grumpy Pants needs more excitement and take him to have the most extreme cup of tea ever. // In this years Capture the Flag contest Best listens to other peoples ideas even if they havent got a war room.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: The twins go to great lengths to protect Bests enjoyment of his book and realize spoilers arent so bad after all. // Best and Bester may have jumped the line for the new fish restaurant, but once inside things take a dramatic turn.

programme.title: Harvey Beaks
programme.desc: Welcome to the peck-uliar world of Harvey Beak, a moderately mellow young bird who flies around his magical forest home of Littlebark Grove, with best-bird friends Fee and Foo, a pair of boisterous twins. The three feathered friends are always looking for new things to do, zooming around the forest embarking on adventures. With many other animals living in the forest, theres plenty of new characters and creatures for the trio to meet, often involving them on their mischievous escapades. Harvey lives with his parents, Irving Beaks and Miriam Beaks.

programme.title: Wallykazam!
programme.desc: When Wally uses his magic stick and the letter T to turn a rock into a talking friend named Rockelle, she leads him and Norville on a journey to find a famous treasure. But Bobgoblin is close behind, and he wants that treasure!

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: Meet Bloom, a girl from Earth, who after she finds out that she is a fairy joins Alfea College on the planet Magix- a magical universe that is inhabited by fairies, witches and other mythical creatures. At Alfea College, fairy warriors from all over the universe study to improve their supernatural powers and here Bloom befriends five other fairies - Stella, the fairy of the Sun, Flora, the fairy of nature, Tecna, the fairy of technology, Musa, the fairy of music and Aisha, the fairy of waves. Together, this group of girls known as the Winx, become best friends and the force to be reckoned with as they experience incredible adventures while defending their universe from varous enemies.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Female Gaze
programme.desc: Cet episode suit lartiste Gabriela Alatorre, entre le Mexique, Londres et Berlin, dans sa quete pour "habiter limage". Realisatrice et photographe, elle explore lautorepresentation feminine comme un territoire de resistance et de reinvention. Son travail brouille les frontières entre intime et collectif : en se photographiant, en photographiant dautres femmes, en leur apprenant à se photographier à travers des ateliers, elle construit un espace où les regards et les corps se croisent, se confrontent et se libèrent. À travers son parcours, le film interroge ce que signifie reprendre possession de son corps et de son image, se representer soi-meme sans mediation, et creer des histoires qui appartiennent enfin aux femmes elles-memes.

programme.title: MMA: Professional Fighters League
programme.desc: Mixed martial arts (MMA) action with coverage of matches from the Professional Fighters League (PFL).

programme.title: Reaction Sports
programme.desc: Reaction Sports offers everything sport fans and sport enthusiasts can dream of. Get your ticket to the front row and enjoy major sporting events from all over the world. Reaction Sports keeps updated on striking national sports news, both national and international, scores and games, and presents highlights from matches and games, analyses and reports, and sections of reaction sports.
